body_html:
I don't mind this if the added load isn't excessive. I would want to make sure that all ops which depend on Kafka exit gracefully and with a clear error if the required library is not found.

In generally, less questions in configure are better.

body:
I don't mind this if the added load isn't excessive. I would want to make sure that all ops which depend on Kafka exit gracefully and with a clear error if the required library is not found. 

In generally, less questions in configure are better.
